title: Make settings window resizable
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Settings window cannot be resized, making it difficult to edit the system prompt text area.

Fix: Make the settings window resizable so users can expand it when editing longer content like the system prompt.

title: Style window with Royal Velvet inspired theme
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Make the window a normal window with titlebar and apply a nice color theme inspired by Obsidian's 'Royal Velvet' theme.

Requirements:
- Normal window with standard titlebar (not floating/borderless)
- Dark purple/violet color palette like Royal Velvet
- Gradients for backgrounds where appropriate
- Consistent color scheme across all UI elements
- Consider: dark purple backgrounds, lighter purple accents, good contrast for text

- Keep the menu bar status item
- The dock icon can be the same symbol or a custom icon

title: Use proper markdown rendering library
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Current markdown rendering has issues with line breaks and formatting. Replace with a proper markdown library.

Options:
- MarkdownUI (SwiftUI native, popular): https://github.com/gonzalezreal/swift-markdown-ui
- Down (fast CommonMark parser)
- Or use WKWebView with a JS markdown renderer

Requirements:
- Proper line break handling
- Code block syntax highlighting
- Good styling that matches Royal Velvet theme
close_reason: Integrated MarkdownUI library with custom theme for proper markdown rendering including code blocks, headings, and lists

title: Make archive the default action, delete via right-click only
description:

Change the history item actions:
- Archive button should be the primary/default action visible on hover
- Delete should only be available through right-click context menu
- This prevents accidental deletion while making archiving easy

title: Fix markdown rendering issues
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

- Create AppIcon.icns or appropriate format for macOS

close_reason: Icon created with Royal Velvet purple theme and prompt symbol

title: Simplify to single prompt with markdown output
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Replace the current JSON structured response with markdown output and simplify to one prompt type.

Changes needed:
1. Remove three-variant system (Primary/Strict/Exploratory) - just one prompt
2. Remove mode tabs from UI
3. Change PromptService to return markdown text instead of JSON variants
4. Add markdown renderer to display the generated prompt (use AttributedString or a markdown library)
5. Update system prompt to request markdown output
6. Simplify PromptHistory model (no mode field needed)
close_reason: Simplified to single prompt with markdown output. Removed three-variant system, updated PromptService for plain markdown, added MarkdownOutputView with AttributedString rendering.

title: Implement Claude Code CLI service

- Handle errors gracefully
- Stream output support if possible
close_reason: Implemented PromptService with Claude Code CLI integration

title: Add system prompt setting

Add a setting in SettingsView to customize the system prompt sent to Claude Code CLI.

- Provide a sensible default prompt

title: Implement Prompter MVP with Claude Code integration
description:
Implement the full Prompter spec as a macOS menu bar app. Key requirements:
1. Use Claude Code CLI as primary LLM backend (shell out to 'claude' command)
2. Complete Xcode project with build infrastructure
3. All UI components from spec (MainView, SettingsView, templates, history)
4. Build scripts + README for clean checkout builds
5. GitHub Actions CI for build gating on PRs
close_reason: All sub-tasks completed: project structure, CI, Claude Code integration, and UI components implemented

title: Make markdown output view resize with window
description:

The markdown output view has a fixed size and doesn't resize when the window is resized. It should expand/contract to fill available space.

Fix: Use proper frame modifiers (.frame(maxWidth: .infinity, maxHeight: .infinity)) and ensure the ScrollView/Markdown view fills the available space.
close_reason: Made markdown output view resize with window by using maxHeight: .infinity instead of fixed constraints

Make it intuitive and consistent with the refined UI.
